(85) The operation could not be completed within the maximum time limit.

LDAPException - Exception in com.rli.slapd.server
 
LDAPException() - Constructor for exception com.rli.slapd.server.LDAPException
Constructs a default exception with no specific error information.
LDAPException(Exception) - Constructor for exception com.rli.slapd.server.LDAPException
Constructs a default exception with OPERATION_ERROR and msg from exception.
LDAPException(Exception, int) - Constructor for exception com.rli.slapd.server.LDAPException
 
LDAPException(String) - Constructor for exception com.rli.slapd.server.LDAPException
Constructs a default exception with a specified string of additional information.
LDAPException(String, int) - Constructor for exception com.rli.slapd.server.LDAPException
Constructs a default exception with a result code and a specified string of additional information.
LDAPException(String, int, String) - Constructor for exception com.rli.slapd.server.LDAPException
Constructs a default exception with a result code, a specified string of additional information, and a string containing information passed back from the server.
LDAPException(String, int, String, String) - Constructor for exception com.rli.slapd.server.LDAPException
Constructs a default exception with a result code, a specified string of additional information, a string containing information passed back from the server, and the DN of the closest matching entry, if the exception was thrown because an entry could not be found (for example, if cn=Babs Jensen, ou=People, c=Airius.com could not be found but ou=People, c=Airius.com is a valid directory entry, the "matched DN" is ou=People, c=Airius.com.

convert ldap exception to jndi exception

LDAPOperations2 - Class in com.rli.ldapclient
This class provides a set of methods to perform LDAP client operations on any LDAP server.
LDAPOperations2() - Constructor for class com.rli.ldapclient.LDAPOperations2
Creates a new instance of this class but does not establish a connection.

Creates a new instance of this class but does not establish a connection.
LDAPOperations2(String) - Constructor for class com.rli.ldapclient.LDAPOperations2
Creates a new instance of this class and establishes a connection using anonymous authentication to the LDAP server specified in the given LDAP URL.
LDAPOperations2(String, String, String) - Constructor for class com.rli.ldapclient.LDAPOperations2
Creates a new instance of this class, establishes a connection using simple authentication (bind DN and password) to the LDAP server specified in the given LDAP URL.
LDAPOperations2(ConnString2) - Constructor for class com.rli.ldapclient.LDAPOperations2
Creates a new instance of this class and establishes a connection to the LDAP server specified in the given connection string object.
LDAPOperations2(VDQuery) - Constructor for class com.rli.ldapclient.LDAPOperations2
Creates a new instance of this class and establishes a connection to the LDAP server specified in the given VDQuery object (representation of an LDAP URL).

Objects of this class represent the components of a distinguished name (DN).
